---
title: "timing"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
success_log <- read_delim("success_log.tsv", delim = " ", skip = 0, 
                          col_names = FALSE)  |> 
  select(X1:X2, X5) |> 
  rename(date = X1, time = X2, file = X5) |>
  mutate(date = str_remove(date, "\\["),
         time = str_remove(time, "\\]"))
  
glimpse(success_log)
```

```{r}
success_log_v1 <- success_log |> 
  mutate(time = hms(time),
         elapsed = time - lag(time),
         seconds = as.numeric(elapsed)) |> 
  filter(!str_detect(file," images"),
         !is.na(elapsed))

glimpse(success_log_v1)
```

```{r}
ggplot(success_log_v1, aes(date, elapsed)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```
